description:
Windows Installer Packaging Tool for Developers, ISVs & Enterprises

Advanced Installer is a Windows installer authoring tool for installing, updating, and configuring your products safely, securely, and reliably.
Fixed Bugs
- The MSI Editor failed to load a valid MST due to a misconfigured validation
- The installation failed for scheduled tasks with multiple triggers
- Fixed some DPI problems affecting trial users of the MSI and MSIX editors
- Urgent security update for 7z.exe binary
